EntryName	PTN7_HUMAN
ProteinName	Tyrosine-protein phosphatase non-receptor type 7 (EC 3.1.3.48) (Hematopoietic protein-tyrosine phosphatase) (HEPTP) (Protein-tyrosine phosphatase LC-PTP)
GeneName	PTPN7
Length	360
Function	Protein phosphatase that acts preferentially on tyrosine-phosphorylated MAPK1. Plays a role in the regulation of T and B-lymphocyte development and signal transduction.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton
